name: Sujimon Quest
description:
A peaceful village is being threatened by the Sujimon, bewitching monsters that can reduce men to lifeless husks. A woman named Gaaru sets out on a journey to find the Legendary Sujimon, a being that can supposedly combat this threat. As it turns out, the Legendary Sujimon is a yakuza named Tatsumi, who has been brought here from another world. Together, the pair will unravel the mysteries behind the Sujimon and bring an end to their reign of terror!


Vanquish dangerous creatures in traditional turn-based combat.

Explore the village during the day as well as at night.

And capture the Sujimon and have them fight alongside you.






Explore the Village, Night and Day
Explore the village by day and accept requests from the villagers. You can also engage in nightly activities to uncover some of the village's more guarded secrets and strengthen your characters.

Catch 'Em All!
The Sujimon bosses can all be captured, and once you've fulfilled certain conditions, you can have them fight by your side!
